entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.53.3: Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • :arrow_up: Bump solid_queue from 1.1.3 to 1.1.4 (#3199) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump parser from 3.3.7.2 to 3.3.7.3 (#3224) @dependabot[bot]

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.53.4: Dependency & Security Updates

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.53.5: Language String, Messaging & Key Rotation Support
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix the Spanish translation link (#3262) Thanks @alex-arce!
  • Preview: Improved expiration message (#3258) Thanks @guntherv73!

:rocket: Features

  • Encryption: Add ability for key rotation (#3261) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1083.0 to 1.1084.0 (#3259) @dependabot[bot]

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.53.7: Reduce Memory Footprint
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

This release changes the application process to run in single mode. This should reduce memory use down to ~300MB. If you disable the background worker with PWP__NO_WORKER=true, then it is ~200MB.

:rocket: Features

  • Memory: Run Puma in single mode (#3277) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.222.1 to 3.222.2 (#3274) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump connection_pool from 2.5.0 to 2.5.1 (#3275) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1087.0 to 1.1088.0 (#3273) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump ffi from 1.17.1 to 1.17.2 (#3272) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.53.7

..and go to http://localhost:5100
